name: Spinach and Pesto Tortellini Soup
description: Ready in 15 minutes - a comforting, quick-fix dinner to warm up with.

ingredients.name: frozen chopped spinach
ingredients.additionalInstruction: thawed and drained of excess liquid

preparation: In a large soup pot, bring Nourish Broth and Pesto Sauce Mix to a boil, then reduce temperature to medium-low.
Stir in tortellini. Simmer uncovered for 5 minutes, or until tortellini is tender and floating. Add spinach and simmer until soup has reheated. Season with Salt and Pepper.
tips: For extra zip, stir in 1–2 tbsp Epicure Marinara Sauce Mix or French Onion Dip Mix.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavour of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.

products.name: French Onion Dip Mix
summary: Ruffled chips and crunchy veggies don’t stand a chance when French Onion is on the table! Gluten and sodium free, and packed with all the delicious taste of toasted onion and parsley, this blend makes a kid-friendly dip, but it doesn’t stop there. Use it to season any savoury dish where you’d like to liven up the flavour with onion — without having to chop or roast a bunch of onions!
